column5: Sam Granger, better known as SamG, has turned his home and yard into a folk art paradise. In the woods of Hollywood, Georgia near Clarkesville, SamG crafts intricate works of art, from a variety of materials. Stop by and check out his collection including the world’s largest grit.
column6: A wonderland of folk art including the World’s Largest Grit.
column8: 1390 Tom Born Rd; Clarkesville, Georgia, 30523-3456; United States
